trans-unit.source: Username: The username to get a token. Start with ws_ normally.
Password: Password to receive an auth token over the API.
Mandant: Each city in BW has its own mandant number.
Base URL: Access data from this URI. Normally: https://sgw.service-bw.de:443/

Allowed languages: Define multiple allowed languages. Format: [2 letters language ISO code]=[sys_language_uid]. Assign multiple languages with ";". Example: de=2;en=5. First value will be used as default language.
